benchmark_details.name: RealKIE
benchmark_details.overview: We introduce RealKIE, a benchmark of five challenging datasets aimed at advancing key information extraction methods, with an emphasis on enterprise applications. The datasets include a diverse range of documents including SEC S1 Filings, US Non-disclosure Agreements, UK Charity Reports, FCC Invoices, and Resource Contracts.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To facilitate the development of NLP models capable of handling practical challenges and support further research into information extraction technologies applicable to industry-specific problems.

data.source: Five unique enterprise document sources including SEC S1 Filings, US Non-disclosure Agreements, UK Charity Reports, FCC Invoices, and Resource Contracts.
data.annotation: Manually annotated text spans referenced against OCR outputs.

methodology.calculation: Models are fine-tuned and evaluated based on the best validation set F1 scores.
methodology.interpretation: Higher F1 scores indicate better performance on key information extraction tasks.
methodology.baseline_results: Results vary per dataset with detailed performance metrics available for models like RoBERTa, DeBERTa, LayoutLM, and Longformer.
methodology.validation: Models validated against training and held-out test sets.
